record.title: APPOINTMENT OF CONFEREES--H.R. 1591
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Chair appoints Mr. Byrd, Mr. Inouye, Mr. Leahy, Mr. Harkin, Ms. Mikulski, Mr. Kohl, Mrs. Murray, Mr. Dorgan, Mrs. Feinstein, Mr. Durbin, Mr. Johnson, Ms. Landrieu, Mr. Reed of Rhode Island, Mr. Lautenberg, Mr. Nelson of Nebraska, Mr. Cochran, Mr. Stevens, Mr. Specter, Mr. Domenici, Mr. Bond, Mr. Shelby, Mr. Gregg, Mr. Bennett, Mr. Craig, Mrs. Hutchison, Mr. Brownback, Mr. Allard, Mr. Alexander, and Mr. Grassley conferees on the part of the Senate.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
